body: If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. i'm so, so sorry,please forgive me. No one will know. no on will see, the sad lives of those living amidst debauchery.
At the edge of time and space, I live in this hollow world.... away from the rest of sane society, haunted by my demons of despair with only endless darkness in sight.
